Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ……いつまでここにいるの？ 日が暮れちゃうよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... How long do we plan on staying here? Don't you think it's getting dark?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>どころか、 クジラの一頭も近寄って来ないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: Forget about the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>, we haven't seen a single whale even.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうだな、ひとまず回収した宝箱を持って マウロのところへ戻ろう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You're right. Let's take the treasure chest back to Mauro for the time being.
